channel.title: Cthulhu Scape is looking for an experienced team!
channel.description:
Hello, my name is Tom and i am currently trying to form a team of people that are willing to help maintain our server. We have quite a few positions open, they are: [s]Hoster: Taken[/s] [s]Forum Designer: Taken (Me)[/s] Coders: 2/4 taken Designers: 0/4 taken Beta Testers: 0/6 taken
If you are intreasted in any of these posistions... u may either contact me via mobile phone (574-855-8221) or by msn: Tom8004@gmail.com.
It's all first come first serve!
If you want to join the team:
[u][b]Name: Age: Position: Experience: Why you want the position you are applying for: MSN: (so i can contact you)[/b][/u]

item.title: Cthulhu Scape is looking for an experienced team!
item.dc:creator: @Tom8004 Tom8004
item.description:
@Tom8004 wrote:

If anyone here want one of the jobs… apply for them… and u will become either an admin or moderator, depending on how much work you do for the team. It is still first come first serve! SO APPLY NOW!

Read full topic
item.source: Cthulhu Scape is looking for an experienced team!
